meanings.definition: An abnormal scar that grows beyond the boundaries of the original wound.
meanings.sent1: The cheloid on his arm was raised and red.
meanings.sent2: She was self-conscious about the cheloid on her face.
meanings.sent3: The cheloid seemed to have a mind of its own, growing larger each day.
meanings.sent4: The cheloid was like a stubborn weed, refusing to stay within its limits.
meanings.sent5: The cheloid stood out like a mountain in the flat landscape of his skin.
